examples: He was one of the greatest musical talents of all time.
a diverse range of musical genres
She had a brilliant career in musical theatre.
A jazz band provided the musical accompaniment to the meal.

meanings.def: with a natural skill or interest in music
examples: I grew up in a very musical family.

meanings.def: pleasant to listen to, like music
a play or film in which part or all of the story is told using songs and often dancing
examples: the star of the hit West End musical
a musical based on the biblical story of Job
a cycle of classic Rodgers and Hammerstein musicals
